DOC.brief_title: Effect Blood Chemistry Inflammatory Marker Omega-3 Enriched Total Parenteral Nutrition
DOC.detailed_description: Fish oil rich source omega-3 fatty acid , especially eicosapentanoic acid docosahexaenoic acid , use widely parenteral nutrition fish oil emulsion commercially available recently . The Objective study evaluate effect blood lipid profile omega-3 enrich total parenteral nutrition healthy Korean male subject . This study design randomize , open-label , 2-treatment , 2-way crossover trial . The 16 subject randomly assign 1 2 sequence two treatment : Combiflex® lipid peri Winuf® peri infuse via peripheral venous catheter 6 hour 3 ml/kg/h . Blood sample collect every 1 hour 0 12 hour start intravenous infusion triglyceride , glucose , insulin . Cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol , AST , ALT , total bilirubin liver function biomarkers , hsCRP inflammatory biomarker analyse 0 , 6 12 hour start intravenous infusion .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 30 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg An informed consent document sign date subject Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease Screening sit blood pressure > 150 mm Hg ( systolic ) > 90 mm Hg ( diastolic ) Use tobacco excess equivalent 20 cigarette per day Use prescription nonprescription drug within 10 day Blood donation within 2 month prior dose , plasma donation within 1 month prior dose Severe hyperlipidemic patient Severe liver failure patient
